channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Evacuations ordered as new California wildfire ignites in scorching heat wave
item.description: Scorching temperatures on the Fourth of July fueled wildfires in California that have burned through the night.

item.title: Hundreds of millions at risk from Chinese shopping app malware
London’s weather is far from summery this weekend
item.description: The weekend weather forecast is typically British.

item.title: Horoscopes today: Daily star sign predictions from Russell Grant on July 6
item.description: Today's horoscope will see one star sign trust their intuition with a difficult decision, while another will avoid arguments in relationships. These are your Saturday horoscopes.

item.title: Watch: Man uses eye socket strength to break two Guinness World Records
item.description: A Las Vegas man who works as a sideshow artist broke a pair of eye-popping Guinness World Records using the strength of his eye sockets.

item.title: A defiant Biden, in denial of the polls and calls to step aside: 3 takeaways from the ABC interview
item.description: President Joe Biden sat Friday for his first television interview since his poor debate performance, a high-stakes moment of seeking to reassure allies and voters.

item.title: Russian authorities detain suspect over St. Petersburg cafe blast
Roblox and Fortnite are destroying video games as we know it – Reader’s Feature
item.description: A reader argues that declining sales for consoles is because children are no longer interested and instead distracted by Minecraft, Fortnite, and Roblox.

item.title: UK weather: Brits face wet and 'unsettled' weekend as Met Office issues warning
item.description: The agency predicts the weekend will continue as it began late on Friday, with the next three days bringing at times thundery showers with brief breaks of sunshine

item.title: Woman wins $220,000 from lottery ticket printed by mistake
item.description: A Nebraska woman scored a $220,000 jackpot from the Nebraska Lottery's Pick 5 drawing with a ticket that was printed by mistake.

item.title: Biden refuses to take a cognitive or neurological test in his first post-debate TV interview
item.description: In his first televised interview since his widely criticized debate performance, Biden would not commit to taking a cognitive or neurological test and releasing the results.

item.title: READ: Trump indictment related to hush money payment
GTA 4 is still the best Grand Theft Auto and needs a remake – Reader’s Feature
item.description: A reader goes back to play GTA 4 and argues that it does many things better than GTA 5, especially in terms of its story.

item.title: Joe Biden says only 'Lord Almighty' would cause him to drop out of presidential race
item.description: Joe Biden, 81, has faced questions about his health and ability to serve following a disastrous debate performance last week, as well as his shaky performance in office

item.title: Look: Mystery emu found wandering loose through Pennsylvania neighborhood
item.description: A Pennsylvania police department is trying to find the owner of an unusual escaped pet found wandering loose -- an emu.

item.title: Biden refuses to take a cognitive or neurological test in his first post-debate TV interview
item.description: In his first televised interview since his widely criticized debate performance, Biden would not commit to taking a cognitive or neurological test and releasing the results.

item.title: Trump pleads not guilty to 34 felony counts
Chelsea’s Conor Gallagher rates Arsenal star Declan Rice as ‘one of the top five midfielders in the world’
item.description: 'He is definitely up there.'

item.title: Warning for UK travellers over passport issues that could 'put an end to holiday'
item.description: Your passport and travel documents are your key to getting away, so you wouldn't want them to put an end to your travels before they've even begun

item.title: Watch: Large, Argentina-native rodent on the loose in Colorado park
item.description: Wildlife officials in Colorado are attempting to track down a long-legged South American rodent seen wandering loose in Lakewood's Bear Creek Lake Park.

item.title: Residents allowed to return home after Wisconsin dam breach led to evacuation
item.description: Intense flooding breached a dam in eastern Wisconsin on Friday and eroded the land around it, prompting officials to temporarily evacuate residents who live downstream.

item.title: The haunting Masters meltdown that changed Rory McIlroy's career
item.description: Slumped on his club, head buried in his arm, Rory McIlroy looked on the verge of tears.

item.title: What’s my horoscope for today? July 6, 2024 astrological predictions for your star sign
item.description: As the Moon angles towards Uranus, this is not a time to stick with the familiar.

item.title: 'I'm a doctor - this is when a pimple is actually a sign of skin cancer'
item.description: There could be something deadly lurking on your skin without you even realising.

item.title: Grandma's advice earns Md. man a $50,000 lottery prize
item.description: A Maryland man said some wisdom imparted to him by his grandmother led to his winning a $50,000 lottery prize.
